title: Sampler, ca. 1738
medium: Medium: linen, silk.  Technique: embroidered in cross-stitch and satin stitch.
inscribed: Mary Beech born April the 4 in the year of our Lord 1724
creditline: Gift of Myra M. and William H. Mathers
description: Very fine cross stitch on linen showing alphabets, a verse, spot motifs, a buck and doe, and a vase of flowers.
